mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_movie (MOVIEID, MOVIENAME, MOVIETIME, MOVIEINFO, MOVIETYPE, MOVIEDIC, MOVIEACT, MOVIERELEASE, MOVIERATING) VALUES(#{movieId}, #{movieName}, #{movieTime}, #{movieInfo}, #{movieType}, #{movieDic}, #{movieAct}, #{movieRelease});
mapper.select: SELECT MOVIEID, MOVIENAME, MOVIETIME, MOVIEINFO, MOVIETYPE, MOVIEDIC, MOVIEACT, MOVIERELEASE, MOVIERATING FROM TBL_MOVIE ORDER BY MOVIEID
SELECT MOVIEID, MOVIENAME, MOVIETIME, MOVIEINFO, MOVIETYPE, MOVIEDIC, MOVIEACT, MOVIERELEASE, MOVIERATING FROM TBL_MOVIE ORDER BY MOVIEID LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
SELECT MOVIEID, MOVIENAME, MOVIETIME, MOVIEINFO, MOVIETYPE, MOVIEDIC, MOVIEACT, MOVIERELEASE, MOVIERATING FROM TBL_MOVIE ORDER BY MOVIERATING DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
